laboratory_examinations.findings: Left atrial mass measuring 4.0 x 3.7 cm attached to the posterior wall of the left atrium and superior portion of the interatrial septum.
Left atrial mass measuring 3.8 x 3.9 x 4.3 cm with numerous calcifications; nearly obstructs the inflow of the right upper/middle lobe and right lower lobe pulmonary veins.
No significant change in the fibroma size; broad base attachment to the superior limbus of the atrial septum with independent motion; multiple calcific foci noted within the mass.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant change in fibroma size over 6 months.
